website_summaries.verdict: A bundle that includes the PS4 Slim and 3 of the best PlayStation titles of this generation.
pros: With a physical copy of The Last of Us Remastered and digital codes for Horizon: Zero Dawn and God of War, this is an excellent value
Everything you need to start gaming
cons: A few customers received digital vouchers that had expired

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal!
customer_reviews.text: Not so much a review as I just wanted to post some photos. This is a fantastic deal, hopefully you were quick enough to snag one here or at another retailer. Of note is that the 2 download game vouchers are stated to expire 03/31/20. (The Last of Us is a physical disc.) Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: tmac8622

customer_reviews.title: Dont download everything at once
customer_reviews.text: I downloaded the Horizon complete edition and the God of war game at the same time with good internet connection, which caused the PS4 to freeze up. so um dont do that. Came back next morning and it finished downloading so its good now. I love it so far!! Great graphics, the controller has awesome feedback, no lag.
customer_reviews.author: Aisha

customer_reviews.title: I like turtles.
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what you can say about a machine that's been on the market for several years, that hasn't been said. The console seems to work fine. Set up was easy, so was connecting it to the web. The games as has been pointed out, are two vouchers, and one actual disc for The Last of Us. The controller works great, and feels good, but the battery life is awful. I could get a couple weeks of casual play out of a Xbone controller, with Enloops. The PS4 controller wanted a recharge after about 2 hours of use. Good machine that I am happy with overall.
customer_reviews.author: Repairman Jack

customer_reviews.title: excellent deal, but...
customer_reviews.text: value is well worth it, but PS4 packaging itself, not the amazon box was damaged. The PS4 nearly fell out as I was opening it since I didn't realize it was broken. Aside from that little mix up, great console.
customer_reviews.author: Wubba lubba dub dub

customer_reviews.title: fast delivery!
customer_reviews.text: It's a PS4 nothing too exciting about that but, it arrived 2 days earlier then expected. nice.
customer_reviews.author: Louis Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Database corrupted. Shouldn’t have gotten refurbish.
customer_reviews.text: Finally got around to regularly playing this ps4. It was great the first couple days but now I constantly get an error message saying the database is corrupted. It started saying it day two, whenever I first woke the PS4 up. But now it pops up all the time; at the start of games and constantly throughout the game. I’ll restart my console and it’s fine for a half hour but does it repeatedly thereafter. I paid too much money for this to have it give me all this trouble on day 2. This is refurbished garbage.
customer_reviews.author: C.

customer_reviews.title: digital game codes do not expire on March 30 2020
customer_reviews.text: I bought the bundle that came with 1 physical copy and 2 digital copies. Upon opening the package, it says on the coupon that the redeemable codes for the digital games expired on March 30 2020 which was before the product arrived. Upon contacting the seller, I was informed that Sony Playstation extended the expiry date to 12/31/2020. And I was able to redeem it after initial network issues. So please check your network connection if you are unable to redeem the digital copies. It should work!
customer_reviews.author: Htet Khant

customer_reviews.title: In great condition . . . So far
customer_reviews.text: It arrived safely by ups. The PS4 is in great condition. Nothing was damaged and the box itslef is in great condition. The PS4 seems to be operating smoothly. However, it was unable to read Midway through my Blu-ray even though I never played this specific Blu-ray on any other player. I will update if anything else goes wrong. Hence the 4 stars instead of 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Junior A.

customer_reviews.title: God of war
customer_reviews.text: I like how it runs with no problems it slows down a little but other than that everything seems to work fine I like how the. Game was a disc and the two digital games were code and the controller worked 100% to the description
customer_reviews.author: Ryan allee

customer_reviews.title: Great console and great games.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great deal. If you know you want a PS4, then I would purchase this. That's what I did. If you want a review on the console or games, just find some videos of them. They've been around long enough and you'll be able to tell if you'll like them or not.
customer_reviews.author: Turtle

customer_reviews.title: I dont reccomend buying this
customer_reviews.text: The CD game works so far and the codes worked for the other 2 games but the ps4 wont download the games, says corrupt data every time. I have been trying to fix the issue since the day I got the ps4 but no luck still it's been like 3 or 4 days of trying to play, kinda disappointed honestly Update: after getting refunded and going to walmart to buy another slim, I can confirm that the ps4 I bought here was not working properly, after talking to experts it sounds like the harddrive was faulty. I'm not saying all the ps4 they are selling are faulty, considering all the high reviews but, there is risk buying this product.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Used and broken. EDITED AFTER REPLACEMENT ARRIVED
customer_reviews.text: The one we got was used and has something caught in the disc slot. Attached a picture of the load up screen. Everything was wrapped in the box, the game it comes with is new and so was the controller. Edit: Amazon allowed me to return it for a replacement. The replacement was new and is working, however, the company I bought it from (Lucky Trading) has yet to return my message. I'd be weary about buying from them. The controller feels cheaper than our other PS4 controllers and the system seems a little slower than our other new ones. Guess time will tell
customer_reviews.author: Vee

customer_reviews.title: Game expiration date/system quality.
customer_reviews.text: Heys guys I just got my order in yesterday 5/13/2020. I live in the U.S. and just wanna say that everything worked fine out of the box. All components were there and the game codes for horizon and G.O.W did work and downloaded just fine. I havent had time to play anything but I do have the games dl'ed and the system looks to be in perfect condition. Hope this helps.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Buy this bundle if you can, don't wait too long
customer_reviews.text: I hesitated for the longest before buying this bundle. I knew the new consoles were just around the corner but could not help myself given PS4's awesome exclusives this year. If you're like me and missed out on the initial PS4 train, I definitely recommend you get on it now with this bundle. Despite the new PS5 and Xbox Series X being just around the corner this console is definitely worth the investment and will provide countless hours of fun. I finally get the hype around GOW and Spider-Man PS4. Definitely do not regret my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Majano

customer_reviews.title: Nothing wrong the only problem for me is...
customer_reviews.text: Nothing much to say I have not test it yet but just wanted others to know only one of the games is a physical copy the other two is a code that's why I give it one star less than perfect for now,as a person who prefers physical over digital this is very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: AVION J.

customer_reviews.title: DualShock 4 controllers are pure rubbish.
customer_reviews.text: The console arrived as expected, I was able to download the games without any issues. The overall experience with this vendor is 10/10. I‘M only giving 3 stars because because of the LACK of quality of the DualShock 4 remote... it’s been barely a month of usage and the left stick is drifting!!.... which mean either “repair” (something new!!) or just buy an expensive $60 bucks replacement.... with inexistent quality. Buyers be aware “they don’t make them like they used to!!”.
customer_reviews.author: Ron.308

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: great Packaging and was shipped carefully and had no damage. I knew I was paying a bit for for this than I could have in other places but it was definitely worth it consider it comes with 3 games!! One is on disk and 2 are codes that you must redeem. The expiration date will be old but Sony has extended the date til next year I believe, so you still have time to download them. I definitely recommend others to order their PS4 here if they are having trouble buying one since a lot of people are ordering consoles during this time. Quick and good shipping and packaging!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica McNeil

customer_reviews.title: Brand new in unopened box and quick shipping! Game codes expiration date extended!
customer_reviews.text: Everything was as expected. Shipped fast (next day) and was brand new in unopened box. FYI the codes that come with it for the two game downloads say that they are expired as of 03/31/2020 but they are NOT. The manufacturer extended the expiration date! I didn't know this at first until I contacted the seller and had a fit about it, so I thought maybe I could save some hassle and headache by making this clear for any potential future buyers. :)
customer_reviews.author: Veronica M.

customer_reviews.title: No regrets
customer_reviews.text: I haven't bought a PlayStation since the early 2000's with the PS2. Most of the time it was the cost that detoured me. I choose to go with Xbox instead, but I'm pleasantly surprised with the PS4. My biggest gripe is the location of the start/share buttons on the controller. I bought this while it was on sale in prep for FF7 Remake.. if it wasn't for that game I wouldn't bother buying it. However, I'm having fun exploring all the exclusive titles. G/F was upset though lol
customer_reviews.author: Pierce, S

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality, not sure if it was legit.
customer_reviews.text: How does is possible that the original controller stop working after 4 months of "non use"? I played maybe 30h since I got it and the right trigger started to present a weird behavior. It's like its always targeting to up. Not able to play because always the character camera go to the top. Very annoying. BTW, it never fall to the floor or something like that. It just stop working. I had ps1,2 and 3. And this is the first controller thay present this problem. If I could I'll return it. But I'm not from US and that won't be possible. I do really need a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Jesus T.

customer_reviews.title: Great Console
customer_reviews.text: Our previous PSIV burned out after several years (>5) and wouldn't play any discs. At the time of ordering this one we were only able to use the streaming functions with our TV. Ordering this newer console coincided with the time just before the pandemic so it was great timing in the long run. We play a ton of games including overcooked, overwatch, silent hill. This set came with God of War which I have yet to start playing but loved the previous versions. This one was been running well. I recommend getting compressed air to clean the dust out of it and keep it running smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Ayala

customer_reviews.title: no games included
customer_reviews.text: I received the ps4 work's great but I did not get codes to download games or the physical game.at the end they sent the games all is still working great
customer_reviews.author: Francisco Salazar

customer_reviews.title: PS4 Review
customer_reviews.text: This bundle is great. It came with; The Last of Us (Physical copy), Horizon Zero Dawn (digital), and God of War (digital copy). Some other reviewers have noted that the download codes were expired. So it seems to be a hit or miss. I purchased this bundle April 3rd and it was delivered within 12 hours! The PS4 itself as excellent. I have really enjoyed it. The PS4 was brand new, well packaged, and shipped within a day. I highly recommend it. Place the PS4 in a well ventilated area that is frequently cleaned and you won't have any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Ares

customer_reviews.title: I've had this for less than a month
customer_reviews.text: I'm getting the CE-34335-8 message and people are saying I need a new hard drive. I bought this a few weeks ago. I'm beyond frustrated with this. EDIT - I installed a new hard drive (a better one) and it's working fine now. It sucks that I had to spend $80 on something that should have been working, but it works. The change wasn't hard, but again, this was new so it should have been working from the start. I would definitely recommend buying this from a physical store instead of online. The return process is much easier from a physical store.
customer_reviews.author: Channon

customer_reviews.title: PS is great, games problematic
customer_reviews.text: The Playstation itself works perfectly, but buyer beware: the codes for Horizon: Zero Dawn and God of War have expired (as of 3/30/2020). You get a physical copy of The Last of Us so that's great, but just realize you're only getting a copy of The Last of Us with this bundle.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Be careful
customer_reviews.text: When I recieved this is must have been a return or something. It didn’t come with controller or cords, and when I went to buy a cord to use it wouldn’t even turn on. Going through the return process now but this was a very sad gift to give to my boyfriend.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Get It!
customer_reviews.text: I was worried that my game codes would it work when I purchased the console, but I received my ps4 on 4/14 (eta was 4/16 - 4/20) and everything works perfectly even though it says the redeem codes expired 3/31... I was also concerned that these were refurbished consoles. These are definitely brand new... Everything is as advertised in my estimation. VERY satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: S.HUNTER

customer_reviews.title: I made the switch from xbox to ps
customer_reviews.text: I did have a slight problem in the beginning where the ps4 glitched a bit. But now it's fine. This is my first ever play station. I only switched to ps because xbox discontinued their camera. So now im here. Lol but I have no really big compliments. Just dont like that even disk have to be updated or downloaded be4 u can play.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: System was good games all worked but the controller was trash
customer_reviews.text: The system run perfectly and the codes received although they were marked as expired they still worked, i didnt purchase it for the 3 extra games only really wanted the system and it has delivered performance the controller that cane with it however was complete shit it didnt last long before it started to bug out the analog sticks for some reason would begin to just move the camera or character in the games alone after several attempts to reset the controller i gave up and reverted back to my old controller.
customer_reviews.author: Lynark

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Waste Your Money
customer_reviews.text: I got the PS4, installed a few games on it. And after the third day I had it it started showing signs of input lag. By the fifth day the hard drive corrupted itself. I’ve tried all the safe mode options I could to fix the problem but no results. So now, like a few other people whose reviews I’m regrettably just now seeing, I have to buy a new hard drive for it which is going to cost me another $50-$100+, so thanks for that.
customer_reviews.author: Josiah Taamai

customer_reviews.title: Is This A Refurbished PS4 Slím System Unit or New
customer_reviews.text: Item defective already. Can’t Access Storage (Hard drive defective not even 2 months in. Now o have to eat tier purchase another storage drive or get fixed, which if I can’t do it myself ( D. I. Y. ). Will incur more costs. Thanks again guys.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah J.

customer_reviews.title: Hard drive defective
customer_reviews.text: This is a risky buy. I bought and within 20mins of starting it up it froze and kept rebooting into safe mode. I tried everything playstation support tells you and still nothing so the following day i took it to a shop they also tried everything before so the wouldn't have to change the hard drive but thats exactly what needed to happen now it plays perfect. So i suggest to be careful because mine was brand new packaging was new its just the system was defective
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Playstation 4 "saved" our sanity!
customer_reviews.text: Yes, the PS4 has been out for YEARS, but my partner and I were pretty content with our PS3, while we waited for the PS4 price to go down. This bundle was bargain-priced and we loooove our PS4, purchased right before the weeks of quarantine! Seriously, the (albeit, virtual) opportunity to travel to distant lands, play a sunny round of golf, fix a broken world or beat up some deserving bad guys has gone a long way to save our sanity. Playstation ROCKS!
customer_reviews.author: Mary B in Seattle

customer_reviews.title: CHECK YOUR GAME CODES IMMEDIATELY AFTER OPENING
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this shortly after Amazon announced their changes to priotize shipping for essential items. My order was set to arrive between "April 2-April 8". Thankfully it arrived on March 31 because the two digital codes for Horizon and God of War 5 WERE DUE TO EXPIRE ON APRIL 1, AKA A FULL DAY BEFORE IT "SHOULD HAVE" ARRIVED. I don't know how long that bundle was sitting there for or if that a Playstation thing but I would have been livid if I had spent that extra money to get a three game bundle only to be able to use one of them.
customer_reviews.author: Tchaikoffee

customer_reviews.title: Best deal!
customer_reviews.text: It comes with 3 amazing games! At least I think so. I played the original "The Last of Use" on PS3 and it was amazing. So I know the Remaster will be just as great. I haven't played God of War (Best Dad Ever) but I hear great things about it from those who have. I am currently spending my free time playing "Horizon, Zero Dawn" and it is simply amazing. It's my kind of game. On top of that, you get a 1TB PS4 Slim! You can't beat this deal.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: It's a PS4 cheap
customer_reviews.text: It arrived a little late but what can you say with all the trouble we are having. You get 1 cd and 2 codes to download 2 of the games. I would rather have the disc so I can trade and travel with them. Good product and a good shipper. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Everything is as listed.
customer_reviews.text: PS4 Slim, with Controller, HDMI cord, Charging cord, Power adapter, and some free useless earbuds. Came with the physical game of Last of Us, and digital codes for God of War and Horizon. WARNING: Codes EXPIRE March 31 2000. If you are buying this, make sure it arrives before the codes expired. YOU ARE LITERALLY BUYING THIS BUNDLE FOR THESE GAMES. If the code expires, this bundle is practically not worth it compared to the PS4 Pro.
customer_reviews.author: Mingxin

customer_reviews.title: Not Fully Equipped
customer_reviews.text: I got the bundle package for my oldest son this Christmas and it was delivered with no matching controller like it states and also no power cord or hdmi. The only thing it came with was one of the three games and console. Such a terrible disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Taryn Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Best bundle to buy for PS4
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my bf’s bday and we both absolutely love it! All the codes still work for the games since they expire in 2021 now, and everything is flawless. We absolutely love horizon (will take longest to download)! The item also came 2 weeks earlier than expected! The seller is very communicative.
customer_reviews.author: Rui

customer_reviews.title: Excellent PS4
customer_reviews.text: I've owned a PS3 for years and since most of my friends and family have been on PS4, I decided to join the party late. I couldn't be any happier with my selection! The package came very securely wrapped and looks to be in great shape. The quality of the images are superb and I've already enjoyed watching Hulu, Amazon Video and Netflix on it. The games it comes with are good too (currently hooked on God of War). I recommend this product from this buyer and I hope you enjoy it as I am.
customer_reviews.author: sgtpika

customer_reviews.title: Almost Burned My House Down
customer_reviews.text: My first review of this product was an excellent one. However, just recently, our home almost caught fire due to the system catching fire. The connection from the power cord (female end) to the systems (male end) literally melted. It left a gaping hole on the back of the playstation. I can't seem to get in contact with the seller Laser Direct Distribution and am out of options. I am 2 months away from a full year since date of purchase and I need answers NOW!!!
customer_reviews.author: Wilfredo Torres Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Replacing it since the games won't install
customer_reviews.text: I've tried everything that Playstation has to over, but they think the machine is just faulty. I'm going to go with replacement for now, but so far this is 1 star review. I've got the package all beat up when i got it, so if it comes like that again, i'll just return without even opening it.
customer_reviews.author: Connie C

customer_reviews.title: Black Friday 2019 deal
customer_reviews.text: Great deal on a great system. Perfect bundle for a family Christmas present. Unfortunately it sold out most places very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: JC Holzer

customer_reviews.title: Great system if you like PlayStation exclusives
customer_reviews.text: I own all 3 current gen systems (Xbox One X, launch PS4, and the Switch). All are great at what they do. If you're interested in PS4 exclusives, this machine is a solid choice. PS4 Slim runs quieter than the launch version of the hardware. The extra storage is a welcome addition. The included games are all excellent. If you're interested in grabbing a PS4 before its successor releases in winter 2020 you can't go wrong with this one (unless you want the added power of the Pro, in which case I'd recommend that model if you've the extra cash).
customer_reviews.author: R. Stein

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it! Doesn’t work half the time
customer_reviews.text: We bought this back in March and have had nothing but issues with it. The WiFi disconnects very often and has a bad connection in general and no this is not from our internet service it’s strictly on the PS4 our switch does not do this nor do our other devices. It randomly shuts off also. If I was to buy this again I would buy it somewhere else.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Infanger

customer_reviews.title: getting back into gaming
customer_reviews.text: decided to finally get this even though a new one is coming out this winter. haven't had a gaming system since the gamecube. it was a good decision to get back into gaming. took a bit longer to get here than I wanted but considering things going on and the fact I just wanted it right away its not a big deal. everything came packaged nicely and had no problem redeeming the game codes even though I bought it the day before they should have expired. the games are cool. easy setup. surprising it doesn't connect o regular bluetooth headphones so might have to get a gaming headset
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ps4 yep it’s awesome , don’t get it here
customer_reviews.text: Great gaming for home . Free games help the start up . Update ...... the controller stop working . Mid being stuck In my place . Dude super not happy with your product . The ps4 is a great machine . You let me down .. booo you
customer_reviews.author: Shaun

customer_reviews.title: Codes Work!
customer_reviews.text: May 8, 2020 : Codes worked just fine for me. You just set up an account, enter code numbers, and you’re ready to download. Fun console. Decided to buy even though PS5 is coming out because, well, that’s another 6 months away. Plus, This is much cheaper than the 5 will be and includes 2 games. Good times ahead...
customer_reviews.author: M.A. Scheffer

customer_reviews.title: no games included. manufacturing package issue
customer_reviews.text: buyer beware. ordered this april 2020. seller was amazon.com, not a 3rd party. box was sealed and new. no games included. no physical last of us disc. no vouchers for the other 2 games. seems to be a somewhat widespread issue. amazon unable to help and return is my only option. sony customer service closed/limited at this time. would hold off buying this bundle. but the console solo at a cheaper price cause it's a toss up if you'll actually get anything in this bundle.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Chu

customer_reviews.title: It's a PS4. Self explanatory
customer_reviews.text: Bought on Black Friday sale. Use it almost daily. Mostly use it to stream movies, but I like the disc and digital games too. Love it just as much as my PS3. Recommend buying an extra controller.
customer_reviews.author: Heather T.

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: Not a new console. Came with only 1 digital game code, no physical game and upon startup the playstation had no operating system on it. DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT!!!
customer_reviews.author: Terry Audsley

customer_reviews.title: It's what I wanted but the games weren't as expected
customer_reviews.text: Everything's included and arrived on time. I thought the games would all be hard copies but only The Last Of Us was, at least Horizon comes with a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Received faster than expected, and all CODES WORK!
customer_reviews.text: Shipment came a heck of a lot sooner than anticipated. Earliest date for delivery was for April 16, after placing an order last Friday, but ended up receiving the package on Tuesday, April 15. Best thing about this bundle--all codes work! Sony is honoring and extending the download period for God of War and Horizon Zero Dawn, so don't worry about only receiving one game to play (Last of Us).
customer_reviews.author: Arzi Rachman

customer_reviews.title: Can’t go wrong with PlayStation!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband as a gift and he loves it! It’s been so nice having a newer PS4! We had the original and got it when it first came out so it’s quite a few years old and was starting to die. And the games are awesome! The Last of Us has definitely made us cry lol, all three of these games have great story lines.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: We love it!
customer_reviews.text: I had to wait to rate this until my grandchildren came over. They absolutely love it. They can download their own games online and it’s quite a hit.
customer_reviews.author: R. Riglesberger

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t come with games
customer_reviews.text: System works great but I feel played :/ I was expecting to get the three games on the cover of the box but I didn’t. I was expecting it to come with some voucher codes so I could redeem the games for free but it came with nothing. On the back of the box in small print it says that the code expired in 03/31/20. That would’ve been good to know considering I got the system after that date.
customer_reviews.author: Nene

customer_reviews.title: Redeem codes ASAP, they might expire if you wait
customer_reviews.text: Was a little nervous seeing that the digital game codes for Horizon Zero Dawn and God of War were supposedly expired. However, the codes were still redeemable. Note that the only physical copy game included is Last of Us. Great 3 games only for PlayStation, so pretty solid. You're locked inside anyway...
customer_reviews.author: wombocombo

customer_reviews.title: Not Equal
customer_reviews.text: I am not a gamer yet, this is my first unit. I cannot leave the game disc in overnight or the next day while I'm at work because the unit will not allow me to continue until I remove the disc and start over. I have been told by others that the regular 1 tig PS-4 does not do that. So - I don't know if I have a faulty player or if this is inherent in these slim units. But this is not what I was told to expect.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Schultheis

customer_reviews.title: Free games were not included. No response from seller.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because it came with 3 games. None of the disks or the codes were included and the codes on other people’s cards (that were not on my box) were expired on 3/30/2020. product received on 4/7/2020. Sent messages to seller with no reply. False advertising.
customer_reviews.author: S P K

customer_reviews.title: Best Gaming Console - Great Deal - But Addictive
customer_reviews.text: This was a great deal for an excellent product. It has great graphics, great games, and is made well - the only problem is getting your kids or husband to step away from the play station. They’d stay up all night playing if you weren’t there to stop them!
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Sloan

customer_reviews.title: PS4 Is great, games not sent with it.
customer_reviews.text: really like my PS4. Just that is missing parts, no games were included. Delivery was great, the PS4 was missing the games advertised. Not even the hard copy came with it. Contacted customer service for a replacement. Will update once I get the missing parts.
customer_reviews.author: Ari Abalos

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal
customer_reviews.text: Its a steal for the price comes with 3 games 1-Disc & 2-digital and the games are really good haven't played God of War yet because i'm still working on Horizon which i see now why it was #1 with it's amazing graphics and mechanics the only downside i can think of is the fact that you don't actually get 1-TB to use for your games and stuff because its also used for the systems start-up data but whatever its nothing new... JUST BUY IT IF YOU HAVEN'T ALREADY!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cloudn9ne

customer_reviews.title: PS4 packed carelessly for a fragile Item
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving this product 3 stars because of the careless and sloppy way in which it was was packed to ship ,It arrived in a amazon shipping box that was too small to put packing on all 4 sides of the unit and showed signs of damage . In addition there was only the air padding on one flat side and the end of the interior leaving the unit pretty much without any shock absorption . I took a chance and unboxed and set up the Console and it seems to be working fine . So i did not send it back. Seriously , fragile items should be to be packed to aabsorb some impact and arrive intact
customer_reviews.author: Leslie  Lyman

customer_reviews.title: Ps4 done
customer_reviews.text: It’s a ps4 what else is there to say with 1 terabyte of memory. I upgraded from a ps2 got a good deal during Black Friday after thanksgiving. Came with 3 games and one controller. What I don’t like is the push to play online and not with just a friend next to you.
customer_reviews.author: jimmie l brown

customer_reviews.title: Cool bundle
customer_reviews.text: My husband and children are happy with it so far. No complaints as of yet. I would recommend anyone who buys this bundle or any gaming system to purchase an extended 3 year warranty. That will give you 2 years of worry free coverage (Minus 1 year manufacturer warranty) if anything should go wrong. I'd recommend this bundle for anyone looking for a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Minor warning: CODES EXPIRE MARCH 31, 2020.  Excellent PS4, zero issues.
customer_reviews.text: PS4 arrived ass expected and worked normally as it should. I was surprised at the price with the three games but as momma said,” don’t look a gift horse in the mouth” Minor warning: CODES EXPIRE MARCH 31, 2020. Be careful if buying as a gift, or iff you don’t intend to open right away.
customer_reviews.author: Peyton

customer_reviews.title: Great System, Great Bundle for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Everything arrived on time and the entire process was seamless. Upon ordering, it processed right away. All items in the package are as listed and in new condition out of the box. * Last of Us is a physical disc. God of War & Horizon are downloadable vouchers that expire 3/31/20 (fyi). I am excited!!! and Satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: CheeChee

customer_reviews.title: Im glad I bought this
customer_reviews.text: Works great, no issues so far. It came with everything it was supposed to come with, and it did come with three games (two digital, one hard copy). Fast, secure shipping. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Dev S

customer_reviews.title: Got it for Final Fantasy. It's OK
customer_reviews.text: It's a PS4. Only complaint was having to get a longer HDMI cable. I got this to play FFVII:R. The console it self did not sell me on being interested in playing the other free games or any other titles. Low FPS gives me a headache when I'm used to 144.
customer_reviews.author: shiggityshwa

customer_reviews.title: Great console, but missing items.
customer_reviews.text: I have a Ps4 already and truely enjoy the console, but ordered a 2nd console marked as "Like New". Items was recieved missing the controller, both down load vouchers, and game disc as described in the item description. Item was returned due to the missing items. I am giving the console 4 stars, but not the item I recieved.
customer_reviews.author: K.z

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! Very fast shipping. All games are amazing. At first I thought I bought a bundle full of expired games until I researched further and found out the expiration dates were extended. I love all the games and the playstation.
customer_reviews.author: Mia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as promised. The seller shipped out quickly and it arrived earlier than expected! It came with two game vouchers (horizon and god of war) and the last of us hard copy disc. Vouchers worked and disc was new. Thank you so much!
customer_reviews.author: seltzer

customer_reviews.title: Best Christmas present for my son
customer_reviews.text: Snatched this deal a week early on sale from Black Friday, it was awesome one of the best deals!
customer_reviews.author: Belita Linebarger

customer_reviews.title: Not a 3 game bundle!!
customer_reviews.text: Pictured is PS4 with 3 disks. In the box was 1 disk and 2 full downloads. I was unhappy but figured I would deal, I open the card to the codes and they are expired as of 6 days ago.
customer_reviews.author: Tylor Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Brand New Product: Digital Codes Worked
customer_reviews.text: So far everything seems to be working. The expired codes worked just fine on April 10th. I am super bummed that there is no digital optical audio. Now I don't know how to get audio without running through my AV receiver which I believe means no HDR and increased lag, which is stupid. Or I am.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy fron them
customer_reviews.text: ordered 2 ps4 bundles by mistake, i returned the other 1 had to pay 35 dollars for shipping becuse there return label didn't work had to wait over a week for them to refund my money and they only did it because amazon got involved on yop that i paid 447 and i only got back 334 because they charged a 20% restocking fee i basically lot like 140 dollars.
customer_reviews.author: Edward E. Cruz

customer_reviews.title: It says I need a headline, so here's a headline.
customer_reviews.text: Two of the games are digital downloads. According to the booklet with the download codes, the codes expired on March 30, 2020. However, I entered the codes and was able to download the games just fine. Otherwise, exactly as described.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. & Mrs. Yoder

customer_reviews.title: Plays Blue Rays and Plays Games
customer_reviews.text: My son got this to use tv apps, play bluerays and play games. It has a much larger memory storage then the original systems and can store more games. It is the basic system, ,black with the black controller. It is simple to set up and works well.
customer_reviews.author: Alice Ceballos

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: Wasn’t a fan of two out of three of the games but, buying games is like a box of chocolates, not sure what it will really be like. It’s came early and clean, minimal damage to actually PS4 box but everything was untouched. One of the better deals out there for a PS4 Slim.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: Its a ps4 what more can I say that people haven't just 2 things that I didn't knew before. 1. It doesn't connect to 5G bandwidth 2. Controller wont pair with you windows device unless using some third-party software
customer_reviews.author: Henil

customer_reviews.title: Brand new console ended up being defective.
customer_reviews.text: Bought a brand new console from this 3rd party site, and it ended up being defective. After a week with no problems, the console started getting error messages when playing games. I don’t understand why this happened to a supposedly brand new console. Fortunately, Amazon had fulfilled a refund on my behalf, and hopefully the next console meets quality standards.
customer_reviews.author: Rohit

customer_reviews.title: Something fun for the hard times.
customer_reviews.text: So far my family is really enjoying this! This shut down has had my children with nothing to do when the weather isn't nice enough to go out. We found a few games to keep us entertained. Thank you, Amazon for having it in stock.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my wife for her birthday and shoe loves it. The game codes were expired but still worked when we plugged them in for the downloads. This is offer is better than anything you can get at a Gamestop.
customer_reviews.author: Doug.D

customer_reviews.title: Price and software..
customer_reviews.text: This was a replacement for my son's old console. I was surprised to find out that this console comes with 1TB, the other unit had 500GB and at the same price. He very happy and me as a father I'm happy for him too. Excellent choice.
customer_reviews.author: jgonz

customer_reviews.title: Almost a great buy
customer_reviews.text: The console itself works just fine but the controller and the HDMI cord were second-rate and used and have a short in them the HDMI broke the first day I got it and the controller charger port has a short in it
customer_reviews.author: Bobby Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Ok so long story short. I bought this for my kids and they love it. I love it. Great buy I'm very happy.
customer_reviews.author: sadone

customer_reviews.title: Game codes all expired
customer_reviews.text: The games that came with this were codes for a digital download and are all expired. Amazon says they can not help as it is Sony that will have to help but their customer service is closed until further notice. So, not ideal
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: It’s Acting defective please help and contact me
customer_reviews.text: Hi I need help contacting support I purchased this PS4 on FEB 12 and delivered on the 14th console is in perfect condition when we got it but now out of knowwhere it’s shut it’s self Of and won’t come back on it’s very frustrating because we paid so much for something that is now acting defected if you can message me for contact info to get this fixed please comment back that information.
customer_reviews.author: Desiree Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Good Bundle
customer_reviews.text: The console came with one controller, one physical game and two download codes. The two codes did work, the console has not given us any issues and it arrived fairly quickly. The console is slim and fits flat or sideways in a small area. It took a while to get use to but are enjoying all the features and took alot of searching to get a bundle! Which made it sweet when I finally got one at a fair price.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandra

customer_reviews.title: Ps4 upgrade
customer_reviews.text: What a perfect birthday gift to give to a friend whose still stuck with a ps3
customer_reviews.author: Elijah vandever

customer_reviews.title: Bonus games were not included as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This bundle advertised that it included three games. The disc for one was included, but the other two ("God of War" and "Horizon Zero Dawn") were not. No vouchers were included. Amazon directed me to contact PlayStation. I contacted PlayStation with my proof of purchase, and was promised by the associate on the phone that she would direct my concern to the department who could help. I received an email, requesting my login information, but have not received any response to my subsequent emails. Disappointing purchase decision.
customer_reviews.author: Amy H.

customer_reviews.title: Ps4 controller won't stop vibrating
customer_reviews.text: I just received my package but the ps4 controller wont stop vibrating, I reset it and it's still vibrating. Because of this issue I will be returning everything
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: PS 4, It's a life choice
customer_reviews.text: What can i say? It works! It plays games well, acts like a centralized TV console, and got rid of my Blu-Ray player as well. It also keeps me from spending a lot of money to build another gaming computer that is more up to date.
customer_reviews.author: Sheldon

customer_reviews.title: Working PlayStation, Expired Game Codes
customer_reviews.text: The PlayStation works as you'd expect a PlayStation to work. The problem is that the game codes for God of War and Horizon Zero Dawn are both expired. Luckily, the Last of Us is a physical copy.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Watson

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great buy. I came here to purchase a ps4 because every store is sold out and so is the playstation site. After reading a lot of reviews, I decided to take a chance... Recieved it in only two days. Came with one game and two downloadable games. Even though they say they're expired, they do work!! I was a little worried at first but I'm super happy with this purchase so far... It's only been two days since hooking it up though but so far so good. The box was a little damaged but not enough to be upset about.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: disc drive stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Well i purchased on Jan 19 2020, the disc drive stopped working a couple days after the return time ended. when I contacted the seller they told me to contact Sony that they couldn't do anything for me. I wasn't able to get ahold of anyone from sony at the time. I went and put it in a repair shop and they couldn't fix it at the time but they did find a coin from the cayman islands in it . me and nobody I know has ever been there it was very surprising because it was supposed to be a new console so now im stuck with
customer_reviews.author: Christopher wagers

customer_reviews.title: Awesome system
customer_reviews.text: Best decision of my entire life. I waste all day playing it. I’ve gained 40 lbs and i never move from my bed. I didn’t know that once you buy one of these it’s basically mandatory to eat Doritos and drink Mountain Dew all day but it’s fine. I’ve spent my entire life savings on snacks and downloadable content. I basically live in the gaming world now. My name is S8NsThiccNuts if anyone wants to add me and quick scope newbs on the new COD or build a Minecraft world and kill the enderdragon uwu. Overall 10/10 kicks my Xbox’s ass.
customer_reviews.author: SadJim

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: Nothing much to say as we already know the quality of this item but it is not the cheapest option here. We bought it thinking it has free games on a CD but the free games are just downloadable online
customer_reviews.author: Hunnybunny

customer_reviews.title: One of the better PS4 slim bundle deals!
customer_reviews.text: Is definitely an amazing console and at a budget friendly pricing. Only downside for me personally is the lack of audio out option on the slim, because if your gaming monitor doesn't have speakers, you kinda have to use your headphones if you want to hear anything. Not a big issue tho! Console works perfect. Definitely worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Mango

customer_reviews.title: Be careful
customer_reviews.text: The Amazon box does Cameron was beat up in the codes for the two games expire March 30,2020 and my package didn’t arrive until April 8, 2020 I feel like they should just send you all three games not downloads if they’re going to be expired otherwise the PS looks good and the one game too
customer_reviews.author: lyndraniesha banks

product_meta.title: PlayStation 4 Slim 1TB Console - Only On PlayStation Bundle
product_meta.description: Playstation4 Slim 1TB Console bundle with matching Dualshock4 Wireless Controller and god of war, the last of us remastered, and Horizon Zero Dawn: complete Edition games.
feature_bullets: ATTENTION: Bundle contains 1 physical game (The Last of Us) and 2 game code vouchers (God of War & Horizon Zero Dawn). Although game codes are printed with a 3/31/2020 expiration date, Sony has extended the expiration date until 3/31/2021. Please redeem codes following the normal process.
Only on Playstation PS4 bundle includes a Jet black 1TB PS4, matching Dualshock4 wireless controller, God of war, the last of US remastered, and Horizon zero dawn: complete edition games.
It is a new beginning for Kratos. With his son Atreus, he must face the brutal Norse wilds and venture on a dangerous, personal journey.

Winner of over 200 game of the Year awards, the last of US has been rebuilt for the PlayStation4 system. Now featuring higher resolution character models, improved shadows and lighting, in addition to several other gameplay improvements.
Experience the full horizon zero dawn adventure. Explore a version of Earth inhabited by mysterious machines in a new open-world action/RPG.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars5,095 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
specifications.Pricing: The strikethrough price is the List Price. Savings represents a discount off the List Price.
